alert.note: Alert for Pima; Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 12 at 3:13PM MST until September 12 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of South Central Arizona and Southeast Arizona, including the following counties, in South Central Arizona, Pima. In Southeast Arizona, Santa Cruz. * WHEN...Until 515 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 310 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms along and east of Interstate 19 between Amado and Sahuarita. Rainfall runoff will continue to drain into normally dry washes, roadway dips and other low-lying areas resulting in minor flooding. Significant ponding of water is likely. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tucson, Sahuarita, Green Valley, East Sahuarita, Summit, Corona De Tucson, Amado and Arivaca Junction. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
